home.introduction-description:
Currently in training at the Web@cad√©mie by Epitech Mulhouse to become a Web developer.
You may browse this website to see the various projects I have worked on during my training.

BSQ.description:
A small solo project to practice my algorithmic skills on.
The goal was to find the biggest square in a parsed text file map.
I implemented the possibility to see in the console the search process as the algorithm looks through the map.
BSQ.name: BSQ

Connect4.description:
Small solo project during which I reproduced the famous "Connect4" game.
I allowed the players to further configure their game session by specifying how many would play and implemented a simple bot logic to play against.
Connect4.name: Connect4

E-Commerce.description:
A month-long "E-Commerce" group project I worked on at the end of my first year.
It was my first experience developing with TypeScript and following the Agile method.
We were given user-stories to work on over 3-days long sprints.
E-Commerce.name: E-Commerce

Portfolio.description:
Another year-long project I worked on solo.
It allowed me to greatly improve my frontend skills and learn reactivity and states management with the Vue framework.
I had up until this project the luxury of always focusing on the backend side of my projects.
Portfolio.name: Portfolio

SoloSail.description:
This was a year long project which I worked on, with three other students, throughout my 2nd year of training.
I have used Figma to make mockups and discuss the layout of the application with my group members.
Then I mainly worked on the backend side of the application and a bit of logging/monitoring.
SoloSail.name: SoloSail

reviews.no-reviews-message: There are no reviews yet, you could be the first to leave one!
